Control Text: Company maintains an information security policy framework
Annual security awareness training is required
MFA is required for all production access
Passwords must be at least 12 characters
Privileged access requires a separate admin account
An Incident Response Plan defines roles and responsibilities
Incidents are reported within 1 hour of discovery
Personal data is encrypted at rest
Personal data is encrypted in transit (TLS 1.2+)
Data deletion requests are processed within 30 days
